author: pipermerriam
content: We've currently settled on uTP as the protocol that we'll be focusing on.  We can always fall back to libp2p if it turns out to be insufficient, but the simplicity of everything going over a single UDP socket and protocol was compelling.

author: pipermerriam
content: So for any of these things where we need to transmit data that exceeds the UDP packet size, it'll use a shared uTP based sub-protocol over DiscV5.
